briefTitle: LapBand Adjustment to Improve Early Weight Loss

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients undergoing gastric band surgery
* Over 18 years of age

Exclusion Criteria:

* Actively bleeding varices
